article_metadata.description: Ladies, if you’re thinking of starting The Pill, or are going in for a gynecology exam in the future, I recommend keeping your doctor in the examining room until you get answers to any questions you may have, no matter how busy she may seem. Ask about your options, including all the different types of The Pill.
